issue.title: Adjustment of parameter types in requires-expressions

discussion.p: It is unclear whether parameter types in a requires-expression are adjusted in the same way that parameter types for functions are adjusted.
Andrew Sutton says that it should be the case.

resolution.p:
Add the following sentence to 5.1.4/5:
The types of parameters declared in a requires-expression are adjusted according to the rules for forming funcion types in 8.3.5.
